# This .gitignore file should be placed at the root of your Unity project directory

# Ignore the following directories
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/
[Uu]serSettings/

# Ignore auto-generated files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Ignore crash reports
*.stacktrace

# Ignore build files
Build/

# Uncomment the following line if you want to include the Build folder
# !Build/

# Ignore other files
.DS_Store
*.swp
*.tmp
*.userprefs
